(Simplified: 潴)
Chinese Definition:
①水積聚：停瀦。瀦積。瀦留(醫學上指液體聚集停留，如“尿瀦瀦”)。
②水積聚的地方。
瀦留 [ zhū liú ]: retention (medicine)

瀦字的基本解释

瀦
zhū
同“潴”。

瀦字的汉语字典释义

[①]［zhū］
［《廣韻》陟魚切，平魚，知。］
亦作“潴1”。
(1)水停聚处。
(2)使变为水停聚处。
(3)蓄积。

瀦字的康熙字典解释

【巳集上】【水字部】　瀦； 康熙笔画：20； 页码：页660第18
【唐韻】陟魚切【集韻】【韻會】張如切，?音豬。【說文】水所停也。【周禮·地官】稻人以瀦畜水。　又【集韻】本作豬。【書·禹貢】大野旣豬。　又東徒切，音都。義同。　【集韻】或作潴。

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［zhū］
["Guangyun" Zhiyu cut, flat fish, know. ]
Also known as "Zhu 1".
(1) Where the water stops gathering.
(2) Make it a place where water stops gathering.
(3) Accumulation.
Zhu
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Siji 1] [Water Word Department] 　潴; Kangxi Strokes: 20; Page Number: Page 660 18
[Tang Yun] Zhiyu cut [Ji Yun] [Yun Hui] Zhang Ruqie, sound pig. [Said the text] The water stops. 【Zhou Li·Diguan】The rice man used to catch the animal water.　[Jiyun] This is a pig. 【Book·Yugong】Ohino Pig.　Tongtu cut again, Yindu. The same meaning.　【Jiyun】or Zhuo.
